coreAttributes.name: arcane sniper rifle
coreAttributes.description: The rifle is a modern .50 caliber rifle with a scope and bipod attached. But for some odd reason, you feel like you want use it up close like some kind of trickshotter.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Snipe [npc2.name] with your arcane sniper rifle.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(draw)] [npc.her] arcane sniper rifle, ready to eliminate threats.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Aiming and firing [npc.her] arcane sniper rifle, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.name] with a powerful arcane bullet!
Taking aim at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] arcane sniper rifle, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger, unleashing a devestating blast of arcane energy that slams into [npc2.namePos] torso!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(aim)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] arcane sniper rifle, and, pulling the trigger, [npc.she] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.herHim] right in the chest!

missDescriptions.missText: Aiming and firing [npc.her] arcane sniper rifle, [npc.name] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc2.name]!
Taking aim at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] arcane sniper rifle, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger, letting out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(aim)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] arcane sniper rifle and [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc.her] target!
